abstract: Milan Jovanović (Serbian Cyrillic: Милан Јовановић, born 18 April 1981) is a Serbian former footballer who last played for Belgian club Anderlecht. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.Arguably, his career and form took off to its zenith playing for Standard Liège, where he was named Belgian Pro League player of the year. For the Serbian national team, coach Radomir Antić created a wing-tandem with Jovanović and Miloš Krasić which is remembered as the best wing-partnership in the modern history of the Serbian national team.
